snippet: Johnathan A. Ferrell was shot by a police officer, who has been charged with voluntary manslaughter, when he apparently sought help at a home after getting into a car accident.
lead_paragraph: Johnathan A. Ferrell was shot by a police officer, who has been charged with voluntary manslaughter, when he apparently sought help at a home after getting into a car accident.

headline.main: Charlotte Police Kill Man Who Appeared to Need Help
headline.print_headline: Charlotte Police Kill Man Who Appeared to Need Help
